name: Splat! (itch) (quinlan.jesus)
description:
• Splat! is a two-player arcade-style shooter game where each player attempts to use their "patent pending" Splat Cannons to cover a blank tile grid in their corresponding paint colors within a minute. Keep an eye out for the power-up.

Controls:

Player One: W,A,S,D = Movement. Space Bar = Shoot.

Player Two: Arrow Keys = Movement. Keypad Zero = Shoot.
